entries.source: Allow hover preview to trigger when hovering over any type of rendered embed such as images or block references
entries.translated: Allow hover preview to trigger when hovering over any type of rendered embed such as images or block references

entries.source: Trigger hover preview on sub-heading links
entries.translated: Trigger hover preview on sub-heading links

entries.source: Use hover editor for links to subheadings, instead of the built-in preview/editor
entries.translated: Use hover editor for links to subheadings, instead of the built-in preview/editor

entries.source: Trigger hover preview on block links
entries.translated: Trigger hover preview on block links

entries.source: Use hover editor for links to blocks, instead of the built-in preview/editor
entries.translated: Use hover editor for links to blocks, instead of the built-in preview/editor

entries.source: Use hover editor for footnotes, instead of the built-in preview/editor
entries.translated: Use hover editor for footnotes, instead of the built-in preview/editor

entries.source: Set the hover editor as the active pane when opened
entries.translated: Set the hover editor as the active pane when opened

entries.source: When double clicking to minimize, the window will roll down instead of rolling up
entries.translated: When double clicking to minimize, the window will roll down instead of rolling up

entries.source: Quickly arrange popovers by dragging them to the edges of the screen. The left and right edges will maximize the popover vertically. The top edge will maximize the popover to fill the entire screen. Dragging the popovers away from the edges will restore the popver to its original size.
entries.translated: Quickly arrange popovers by dragging them to the edges of the screen. The left and right edges will maximize the popover vertically. The top edge will maximize the popover to fill the entire screen. Dragging the popovers away from the edges will restore the popver to its original size.

entries.source: Show the view header by default when triggering a hover editor. When disabled, view headers will only show if you click the view header icon to the left of the minimize button.
entries.translated: Show the view header by default when triggering a hover editor. When disabled, view headers will only show if you click the view header icon to the left of the minimize button.

entries.source: Click and hold an image within a hover editor to temporarily maximize the popover and image to fill the entire viewport. On mouse up, the hover editor will restore to its original size.
entries.translated: Click and hold an image within a hover editor to temporarily maximize the popover and image to fill the entire viewport. On mouse up, the hover editor will restore to its original size.

entries.source: How long to wait before showing a Hover Editor when hovering over a link
entries.translated: How long to wait before showing a Hover Editor when hovering over a link

entries.source: How long to wait before closing a Hover Editor once the mouse leaves
entries.translated: How long to wait before closing a Hover Editor once the mouse leaves
